A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the best film of the sequel trilogy and the best Star Wars film since The Empire Strikes Back. A nuanced\, compelling drama of a nobody girl from nowhere trying to find her place in the galaxy; a spiteful\,  powerful young man burdened by his legacy and the phantoms of the past; a reluctant \"legend\"\, and a small band of freedom fighters desperately trying to survive the onslaught of a rising evil. . .
